Name: Lucklight Fly
Desc: These creatures dwell within The Chasm, absorbing the energies of the strange stones within and emitting a dim light. Because they give off light, they are loved by miners and concerned a good omen, thus their term "Lucklight."\nAfter all, any light in such darkness is to be treasured.\nWhen "something strange" was unearthed in The Chasm, their numbers also began to increase greatly.
